lookup.use: Check if a system exists in EDSM

locate.use: Check if a CMDR exists and shares their location in EDSM

distance.use: Check the distance between two points in EDSM

landmark.use: Check if a given point is nearby a given Landmark System

dssa.use: Check for the closest DSSA carrier to a given location.

diversion.use: Calculate the 5 closest FDEV-placed structures with repair capability to given location.

coords.use: Check EDSM for a nearby system to a set of coordinates

mancase.use: Used to start a new Manual Seal Case by Dispatchers. Drillled Seals Only, and run in a channel.

manfish.use: Used to start a new Manual Kingfisher Case by Dispatchers. Drillled Seals Only, and run in a channel.

tsping.use: Used to ping the Trained Seal role in the Seal discord. Drillled Seals Only, and run in a channel.

last.use: Check the time since the last case.

listboard.use: Print out the current cases on the Board.

listcase.use: List specific details of a current case.

rename.use: Rename the client for the given case.

ircn.use: Set the updated client's IRC Name.

status.use:
Set the updated case status.
Valid options include 'ACTIVE', 'DELAYED', and 'INACTIVE'.

hull.use: Set the updated case hull percentage.

casetype.use:
Set the updated case type.
Valid options include 'Seal', 'Black', 'Blue', and 'Fish'.

platform.use:
Set the updated case platform.
Valid options include 'Odyssey', 'Live', 'Legacy', 'Xbox' and 'PlayStation'.

allfacts.use: Lists all facts of a given language two-letter code. Defaults to English (en).

factinfo.use: Get information about a specific fact.

deletefact.use: Deletes a fact from the database.

addfact.use: Adds a fact to the database with the specified language. Defaults to English.

editfact.use: Edits a fact in the database with the specified language.

ufi.use: Updates the local fact cache with the database.

ping.use: Check to see if the bot is responding to commands.

dbping.use: Reply with the latency between the Bot and the Database.

edsmping.use: Reply with the latency between the Bot and the EDSM API.

serverstatus.use: Reply with the current Elite server status according to EDSM.

utc.use: Check for the current In Game Time and Date

year.use: Check for the current In Game Year

whois.use: Check the user information for registered name. Must be a registered user, and run in DMs with HalpyBOT.

whoami.use: Check the user information on yourself. Must be a registered user, and run in DMs with HalpyBOT.

forcejoin.use: Force a user to join an allowed channel in IRC. Drilled Seals Only, must be run in a channel.

rrjoin.use: Force a user to join #Repair-Requests channel in IRC. Drilled Seals Only, must be run in a channel.

opsignal.use: Sends a notification to the Admins and Mods with a given message.

cybersignal.use: Sends a notification to the Cyberseals with a given message.

drillcase.use: Starts a new Drill Case, separated by Commas

drillkfcase.use: Starts a new Drill Kingfisher Case, separated by Commas

drillcbcase.use: Starts a new Drill CB Case, separated by Commas

notifyinfo details.use: List the contact details of a particular group.

addsub.use: Adds a phone number or email address to the notification group given.

settings nick.use: Change the nickname of the bot.

settings prefix.use: Change the interaction prefix of the bot.

settings offline.use: Change the Offline Mode database connection status.

settings warning_override.use: Enable override for offline mode notifications.

joinchannel.use: Make the bot join a channel. After restart, it will still be in the channel.

partchannel.use: Make the bot leave a channel.

shutdown.use: Shut down the bot. Will restart the bot if configured under daemon processing.

roll.use: Roll the dice! (Up to 10 dice of any size)
